top_categories.workout_context: Dunoon Dirt Dash’s uk scotland, british gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Dunoon Dirt Dash rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Racing Dunoon Dirt Dash isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Dunoon Dirt Dash when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
The varied gradients at Dunoon Dirt Dash reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Dunoon Dirt Dash. Make this intensity feel like home.
Dunoon Dirt Dash’s uk scotland gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Dunoon Dirt Dash — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Low-cadence force work builds the muscular strength for Dunoon Dirt Dash’s 3,000ft of climbing — especially the grinding, low-speed ascents.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Dunoon Dirt Dash — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on uk scotland gravel.
Cadence efficiency makes every pedal stroke at Dunoon Dirt Dash count — smooth technique reduces muscular fatigue over long distances.
Dunoon Dirt Dash’s uk scotland gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Dunoon Dirt Dash’s 45 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Dunoon Dirt Dash requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on uk scotland gravel to build confidence. Expect: uk scotland, british gravel, uk.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, TT Threshold, and Race Simulation to prepare you for 45 miles of uk scotland gravel in Dunoon, Scotland, UK.
